oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reach Out and Touch Someone: Hybrid Radio and Phone Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rothbauer, Donald L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Communication
veterinarian practice
two way radio
Cellular phones
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Communication is one of the keys of a successful practice. The veterinarian must be able to communicate with clients, the office, other veterinarians within the practice, home, the answering machine, and the experts. The two way radio system does not allow all these contacts to be made from the practice vehicle. Cellular phones do, but with some disadvantages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1993; 195
